content.text: Hansel is incredibly loyal to those that he loves, and can feel guilt whenever he does them wrong. He's also a curious type, being more tame in situations he doesn't understand or been in before.

Hansel is an incredibly selfish person with little disregard to other sentient beings unless they contributed a significant change to him as a person. He is sadistic, vulgar and cruel, seeing suffering as a form of entertainment.

stats.label: Eye color
stats.value: Green eyes, hot pink circle rim.
